text: Erin Richards (born 17 May 1986) is a Welsh actress. She was born in Penarth, Vale of Glamorgan, Wales. She is best known for playing Molly Hughes in the television series Breaking In and Barbara Kean in the television series Gotham. ==References== Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh movie actors Category:Welsh television actors Category:Welsh voice actors Category:Welsh stage actors
title: Erin Richards
